org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.bufferprovider

Class GlobalBufferPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.bufferprovider.GlobalBufferPool

  • public final class GlobalBufferPool
extends Object
    A global buffer pool for the network stack.

    All buffers used by the network stack come from this pool. Requests to this pool are mediated by instances of LocalBufferPool.

    The size and number of buffers can be configured via the global system config.
